message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $125. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $120. That's the lowest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
